citations.narrative:
SHEEP AND GOATS ARE BEING FED HAY ON THE GROUND. THEY ARE STANDING ON THE HAY THEY
ARE EATING. HAY NEEDS TO BE FED IN A HAY RACK OR MANGER THAT WILL KEEP IT OFF THE GROUND
AND FREE FROM CONTAMINATION.
CORRECT BY: OCTOBER 22, 2014
THIS ROUTINE INSPECTION AND EXIT BRIEFING WAS CONDUCTED WITH THE OWNER OF THE FACILITY.
END OF REPORT.

FEEDING.

AND FREE FROM CONTAMINATION.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
